resp = client.search(
    index="products",
    aggs={
        "genres_and_products": {
            "multi_terms": {
                "terms": [
                    {
                        "field": "genre"
                    },
                    {
                        "field": "product"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
